name: Defuse the Bomb!
description:
Defuse the Bomb - is an action-puzzle top down shooter game, in which you have to, well, defuse a bomb. The main problem is - you only have 10 seconds to get to the bomb, and there many terrorists are trying to stop you! Move fast, use any weapon you can find, and show them who is the boss!

You play as a Sergeant, and you have to defuse all bombs you can find at all 30 levels.

Credits: sound effects - https://freesound.org/

Made by using Unity engine.

If you liked this game, please, consider yourself to support my game development by donating some money. Thanks!
